sentences.sContent: the threat of industrial conflict in the coalfields
sentences.sCn: 煤田发生劳资纠纷的风险

sentences.sContent: Marx points out the potential conflicts below the surface of society.
sentences.sCn: 马克思指出了隐藏在社会表层之下的潜在矛盾。

sentences.sContent: His views on the literal truth of the Bible brought him into conflict with other Christian leaders.
sentences.sCn: 他坚持《圣经》字面真理的观点使他与其他的基督教领袖发生了冲突。

sentences.sContent: Doctors exercise considerable power and often come into conflict with politicians.
sentences.sCn: 医生行使很大的权力，常常和政客们发生冲突。

sentences.sContent: a lawyer specializing in conflict resolution

phrases.pCn: 利益冲突；公职人员对公众义务与其本身利益相冲突
法律之间矛盾，法律冲突
纷争地带；冲突地带；战争启示录
目标冲突；目标之间的矛盾

remMethod.val: con(共同) ＋ flict(打击) → 互相打 → 冲突； 战争

words.tran: 冲突的；相矛盾的；不一致的

trans.tranOther: a state of disagreement or argument between people, groups, countries etc
